    • Method Detail

      • payOrder

        Order payOrder​(int id_order,
               java.lang.String token)
        throws NoPermissionException,
               InvalidTokenException
        Method to validate payment of an order by a validate token and an existing non payed order
        Parameters:
        id_order - the id of the order
        token - a validate token
        Returns:
        Set the status of the order, and display an information message of the operation done
        Throws:
        NoPermissionException
        InvalidTokenException

        Parameters:
        token - a validate existing token
        Returns:
        the information about the order
        Throws:
        NoPermissionException
        InvalidTokenException
